Package no.uis.party

Class PartyManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • no.uis.party.PartyManager
  • public class PartyManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Singleton class that manages what party a player goes into depending on the role they select
    Author:
    Alan Rostem

        Method used to update the game sequentially. Party management core logic occurs here. Execution is performed sequentially by a TickExecution object.

      • queueUpPlayer

        public static void queueUpPlayer​(Player player)
        Queues up a player for a party. The player is added into a queue respective to its PlayerType
        Parameters:
        player - Either a proposer or guesser depending on the PlayerType
        See Also:
        Player.PlayerType
